SEARCH
Package graphics

Class Vector

java.lang.Object
graphics.Vector
public class Vector extends Object
This class is used for Vector math.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Vector()
    Default Constructor for Vector object.
    Vector(double x, double y)
    Constructs a Vector using x and y components
    Vector(Point2D p1, Point2D p2)
    Constructs a Vector from two points.

  • Constructor Details

    • Vector

      public Vector()
      Default Constructor for Vector object. Returns a zero Vector

    • Vector

      public Vector(double x, double y)
      Constructs a Vector using x and y components
      Parameters:
      x - The x component
      y - The y component

    • Vector

      public Vector(Point2D p1, Point2D p2)
      Constructs a Vector from two points. Parameter order is important, the Vector's direction will be pointing FROM Point 1 TO Point 2
      Parameters:
      p1 - Point 1
      p2 - Point 2

    • getPointFrom

      public Point2D getPointFrom(Point2D startPoint)
      Returns the terminating point of the Vector, given a starting point
      Parameters:
      startPoint - Starting point
      Returns:
      Terminating point

    • getUnitVector

      public Vector getUnitVector()
      Returns a unit Vector with the same direction as this Vector
      Returns:
      New unit Vector

    • reverse

      public Vector reverse()
      Returns a Vector equal in magnitude add opposite in direction to this Vector
      Returns:
      New reverse Vector

    • orthogonal

      public Vector[] orthogonal()
      Returns a Vector array containing the two Vectors of equal magnitude that are orthogonal to this Vector
      Returns:
      Orthogonal Vector Array (length: 2)
